Posts.Title: Surgeon Just called home # left message..HE has results

Posts.Content: Thank you "JennyTwist" for the unique ornament - I like the card inside that explained how it was made, blown out, and painted! And the pink stocking with little surprises -- sure made my day happy!!! Merry Christmas, pink sister! Sue D.
Posts.Title: special ornament and surprises came in the mail today

Posts.Content: I think a second or even a third opinion might help in thst decision .... I had radiation ... the Canadian shortened type but not the extra reincision but each type of cancer and margins differ mine were not even specifically stated on the path report and we had to keep personally calling the surgeon and he said he went back and took out more to get a clear margin but it really made me mad that it wasnt even inthe path report! Mine was DCIS estrogen and progesterone positive so now am on tamoxifin but getting another opinion about that soon ...... Sue D
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy Close Margins

Posts.Content: Ms Gebby, You are most welcome! Sue D
Posts.Title: Ornament Recieved

Posts.Content: Try a small table fan on low at night and cotton sheets only ..... even in winter this hhas helped me at night If I take the tamoxifin in the morning the hot flashes are really bad while i am teaching soI take it abiut 8 at night and put up with the heat waves I am extremeely tired though from waking up in such a sweat during the night but it reminds me that the tamoxifin is doing its job! Best of luck and prayers for your hot flashes .... I understand thoroughly it is the pits though!
Posts.Title: How to minimize hot flashes from Tamoxifen?

Posts.Content: Linda, Glad to see you back and hope you are doing better... keep up the positive attitude ....praying for you ... Sue D
